dentalTips.title: Toothache
dentalTips.description: Avoid very hot or cold drinks to reduce pain.

dentalTips.title: Gum Pain
dentalTips.description: Gentle brushing and flossing help reduce inflammation.

dentalTips.title: Bad Breath
dentalTips.description: Brush your tongue and drink plenty of water.

dentalTips.title: Cavities
dentalTips.description: Limit sugary snacks and brush twice a day.

dentalTips.title: Sensitive Teeth
dentalTips.description: Use a soft-bristled toothbrush and desensitizing toothpaste.

dentalTips.title: Plaque
dentalTips.description: Brush and floss regularly to prevent plaque buildup.

dentalTips.title: Tartar
dentalTips.description: Regular professional cleaning helps remove tartar.

dentalTips.title: Tooth Discoloration
dentalTips.description: Limit coffee, tea, and tobacco to prevent stains.

dentalTips.title: Braces Care
dentalTips.description: Use orthodontic toothbrushes and avoid sticky foods.

dentalTips.title: Oral Ulcers
dentalTips.description: Avoid spicy or acidic foods to reduce irritation.

dentalTips.title: Dry Mouth
dentalTips.description: Drink water frequently and chew sugar-free gum.

dentalTips.title: Mouth Odor
dentalTips.description: Rinse after meals and brush twice daily.

dentalTips.title: Oral Cancer Awareness
dentalTips.description: Regular screenings help detect problems early.

dentalTips.title: Teeth Grinding
dentalTips.description: Wear a mouth guard and reduce stress.

dentalTips.title: Wisdom Teeth
dentalTips.description: Maintain good hygiene and visit the dentist regularly.
